title: Social Media Content Creator

stepDetails.question: You need to create an Instagram post for a coffee shop's grand opening. Which prompt will work best?

options.text: Write a post about a coffee shop
options.explanation: Too vague - missing platform specifics, audience, tone, key details about the opening, and call-to-action.

options.text: Create an Instagram post for a local coffee shop opening next week. Make it engaging.
options.explanation: Has platform and basic info, but lacks target audience, specific tone, opening details, and structured requirements.

options.text: Create an Instagram caption for a local artisan coffee shop's grand opening next Saturday. Target: young professionals aged 25-40. Tone: warm and inviting. Include: location, 20% off opening special, and CTA to follow. Use 2-3 emojis, under 150 characters.
options.explanation: Perfect! Specifies platform, audience, tone, all key details, format requirements, and length constraint.

stepDetails.question: A fitness trainer wants a viral LinkedIn post for their mentorship program. Which prompt is best?

options.text: Write a LinkedIn post for a career coach's tech mentorship program. Target: mid-career professionals pivoting to tech. Start with a compelling story hook, include actionable career tips, end with program CTA. Keep under 1300 characters. Tone: inspiring and authentic.
options.explanation: Excellent! Includes audience, structure (hook/tips/CTA), length limit, tone, and clear objective.

options.text: Create a LinkedIn post about a mentorship program for people changing careers to tech
options.explanation: Has the basic topic and audience, but missing structure, tone guidance, length limits, and specific call-to-action.

options.text: Write something about a mentorship program
options.explanation: Extremely vague - no platform, audience, topic details, structure, or any specific requirements.

stepDetails.question: Create a TikTok script for home workout content. Which prompt will get the best result?

options.text: Write a TikTok script for a fitness trainer showing home workouts without equipment
options.explanation: Has platform and general concept, but missing time length, hook strategy, specific exercises, and target audience.
No platform, format, audience, exercises, or content structure specified. AI has no direction.

options.text: Create a 30-60 second TikTok script for a fitness trainer. Target: busy professionals aged 25-40. Include: catchy 3-second hook, 3-4 no-equipment exercises with clear form cues, motivational messaging. Message: effective workouts don't need a gym.
options.explanation: Perfect! Specifies platform, length, audience, structure with timing, exercise count, and key message.

stepDetails.question: A sustainable fashion brand wants to launch an educational campaign on Twitter. What's the most effective prompt?

options.explanation: No campaign structure, educational goals, target audience, or tweet thread format specified.

options.text: Create Twitter content for a sustainable fashion brand's educational campaign
options.explanation: Has brand and campaign type, but missing specific topics, thread structure, educational objectives, and audience targeting.

options.text: Create a 5-tweet educational thread for an eco-fashion brand. Topic: '5 ways to build a sustainable wardrobe'. Target: environmentally conscious consumers 18-35. Format: hook tweet, 3 educational tweets with statistics/tips, conclusion with brand CTA. Tone: informative but approachable. Include hashtags #SustainableFashion #EcoStyle.
options.explanation: Perfect! Specifies thread length, topic breakdown, audience, tweet-by-tweet structure, tone, and relevant hashtags.

stepDetails.question: A local restaurant needs Pinterest content for their weekend brunch menu. Which prompt will deliver the best results?

options.text: Make Pinterest posts for a restaurant
options.explanation: Missing platform specifics, menu items, visual direction, target audience, and engagement goals.

options.text: Create 5 Pinterest pin descriptions for a farm-to-table restaurant's weekend brunch. Target: foodies and local diners 25-45. Include: SEO keywords (brunch recipes, local dining, fresh ingredients), seasonal highlights, call-to-action for reservations. Tone: appetizing and authentic. Format: compelling titles, detailed descriptions, relevant hashtags.
options.explanation: Excellent! Covers pin count, target audience, SEO strategy, specific content focus, tone, and platform-optimized formatting.

options.text: Write Pinterest content for a restaurant's brunch menu
options.explanation: Has topic and platform, but lacks pin count, target audience, SEO keywords, tone guidance, and specific formatting requirements.

stepDetails.question: A tech startup wants to create a LinkedIn carousel post about their remote work solution. What's the optimal prompt?

options.text: Create a LinkedIn carousel post about a remote work tool
options.explanation: Has topic and format, but missing slide structure, pain points to address, target audience, and business objectives.

options.text: Write content for a tech company
options.explanation: No specific topic, platform, format, audience, or business context provided.

options.text: Design a 10-slide LinkedIn carousel for a remote collaboration software. Target: HR managers and team leads at mid-size companies. Structure: Problem slide (2 statistics), Solution overview, 3 feature-benefit slides, Customer testimonial slide, Pricing/CTA slide, Contact info. Tone: professional but approachable. Include remote work pain points and productivity metrics.
options.explanation: Perfect! Specifies exact slide count, detailed slide-by-slide structure, target audience, pain point focus, and professional tone guidelines.

description: Master the art of crafting engaging social media posts that capture attention and drive engagement.

examplePrompts.explanation: Too vague - no context about the topic, platform, audience, or tone. The AI has no direction.

examplePrompts.prompt: Write an Instagram post about a coffee shop opening next week
examplePrompts.explanation: Better - has topic and platform, but missing key details like target audience, tone, call-to-action, and post format.

examplePrompts.prompt: Create an Instagram caption for a local artisan coffee shop's grand opening next Saturday. Target audience: young professionals and coffee enthusiasts aged 25-40. Tone: warm, inviting, community-focused. Include: location highlight, opening day special (20% off), call-to-action to follow for updates. Use 2-3 relevant emojis. Keep it under 150 characters.
examplePrompts.explanation: Excellent - specifies platform, topic, audience, tone, key information to include, format requirements, and length constraint. Gives AI everything needed.
